enum.name: MAV_CMD
enum.description: Additional Commands to be executed by the MAV. According to ASIO ICD

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ASIO_SET_SENSOR
entry.description: Selecting sensor. Require reset after set

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ASIO_SET_REC
entry.description: Selecting logging mode. Require reset after set

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ASIO_SET_NAV_MODE
entry.description: Selecting navigation mode. Require reset after set

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ASIO_SET_INIT_LOC
entry.description: Selecting initial location. set 0 to clear
entry.param: Altitude (Note: not implemented on Asio side)

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ASIO_RESET
entry.description: Reset

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ASIO_CAL
entry.description: Initiate calibration of installation angles

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ASIO_SET_SLAM_MODE
entry.description: Enabling Force SLAM mode

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ASIO_SET_SLAM_TIMEOUT
entry.description: Set timeout to SLAM mode. After timeout, if GPS is valid, take GPS data, othewise keep SLAM

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ASIO_SET_MAP_WARNING_RANGE
entry.description: Range in meters around the current drone location to send "edge of map" warning

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ASIO_SET_DB_REC
entry.description: Not Implemented - DO NOT USE

entry.name: ASIO_SENSOR_AUTO
entry.description: Not Implemented

entry.name: ASIO_REC_IMAGE_ONLY
entry.description: not implemented

entry.name: ASIO_NAV_MODE_FORCE_TO_NO_GPS
entry.description: do not use gps at all, if slam is used for more than X Sec. will try to read gps pos, othewise will keep slam (pre define parameter [s])

entry.name: ASIO_NAV_MODE_GPS_ON_TAKEOFF
entry.description: if gps is valid, use it when close to home (pre define parameter [m]). or if slam where used for more than X Sec (pre define parameter [s])

entry.name: ASIO_NAV_MODE_USE_GPS_WHEN_FIX
entry.description: use GPS when valid

entry.name: ASIO_NAV_STATE_NONE
entry.description: Should be only on boot

entry.name: ASIO_NAV_STATE_ANCHOR
entry.description: GeoReference is valid

entry.name: ASIO_NAV_STATE_SLAM
entry.description: GeoReference is not valid, sys is now in SLAM mode

entry.name: ASIO_NAV_STATE_ON_GROUND
entry.description: Indicates NO_GPS_MODE before takeoff. keeps initial position for first few meters after takeoff

entry.name: ASIO_NAV_STATE_ANCHOR_ON_TAKEOFF
entry.description: GeoReference is valid while using GPS as output during takeoff

entry.name: ASIO_SYS_STATE_INIT
entry.description: Should be only on startup. Do not takeoff in init state

entry.name: ASIO_SYS_STATE_READY
entry.description: System is ready and fully operational

entry.name: ASIO_SYS_STATE_FAULT
entry.description: Not Implemented

entry.name: ASIO_NAV_OUTPUT_GPS
entry.description: GPS data is outputted as the navigation solution - can be during takeoff or after SLAM timeout

entry.name: ASIO_NAV_OUTPUT_OPTICAL
entry.description: Optical solution data is outputted as the navigation solution

entry.name: GPS_JAMMING_STATE_OK
entry.description: GPS valid

entry.name: GPS_JAMMING_STATE_WARNNING
entry.description: Not Implemented

entry.name: GPS_JAMMING_STATE_JAMMED
entry.description: GPS is jammed valid

entry.name: ASIO_ERROR_CRITICAL
entry.description: Critical system error

entry.name: ASIO_ERROR_GENERAL_WARNNING
entry.description: Warning - Nav solution still available, but might be limited

entry.name: ASIO_ERROR_TELEM
entry.description: Critical telemetry (YAW, etc) from UAS is not received

entry.name: ASIO_ERROR_DAY_SENSOR
entry.description: Day sensor fault, will be sent together with ASIO_ERROR_CRITICAL

entry.name: ASIO_ERROR_NIGHT_SENSOR
entry.description: Night sensor fault, will be sent together with ASIO_ERROR_CRITICAL

entry.name: ASIO_ERROR_ANCHOR
entry.description: Not Implemented

entry.name: ASIO_ERROR_TEMPERATURE
entry.description: Not Implemented

entry.name: ASIO_ERROR_LOGGING
entry.description: Not Implemented

entry.name: ASIO_CALIBRATION_STATE_PROCESS
entry.description: Calibration procedure is in progress

message.name: ASIO_STATUS
message.field: Internal temperature of the system, set to -1 if invalid
